1.Text: It’s a brand new day at the bottom of the sea and you still can’t breathe underwater. But don’t let that silly fact ruin your fun!

2.Text: You thought you were having an epiphany, but it turns out it was just your oxygen-deprived brain. A new scenario for a known experience.

3.Text: A group of clownfish tells the worst jokes you’ve ever heard, and you laugh anyway.

4.Text: A bubble floats by, and you swear it whispers your name.

5.Text: A clam shuts tight when you try to say hello. Rude!

6.Text: A shrimp asks you to help carry its oversized luggage. You politely decline.

7.Text: A sand Bitcoin tells you to invest wisely, then disappears.

8.Text: A grumpy sea urchin tells you to “watch where you step!” even though you’re floating.

9.Text: A dolphin teaches you how to whistle underwater. It’s harder than it looks.

10.Text: An octopus invites you to play hide-and-seek. You’ll never win.

11.Text: A shrimp challenges you to a staring contest. You lose immediately.

12.Text: A whale waves at you with its tail, and you feel incredibly small.

13.Text: A sea slug claims it’s the fastest creature in the ocean. You nod politely.

14.Text: Ouch! You find yourself in the wrong school (of fish). The fishiest of the bunch fin-slaps you for asking where the bathroom is…

15.Text: Fancy that! Even underwater, an eel’s zap can still leave your muscles numb. Fascinating!

16.Text: A jellyfish politely asks for directions, but you have no idea where you are either.
